---
title: Fibrocartilage
---


Fibrocartilage is used to line the mandibular condyle instead of hyaline cartilage since it absorbs forces of mastication better and has a superior reparative process @neumannKinesiologyMusculoskeletalSystem2017

# Histology

- Type 1 collagen
- Moderate GAGs

# Examples

IVDs, labrum, menisci , AC, SC
